mapper.insert: insert into discount(dtitle, dcontent, dphoto) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{photo})
mapper.select:
select d.dno, d.dtitle, d.ddate, d.dcontent, d.dcount, d.dphoto, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name
from discount d inner join member m on m.mno=d.mno
where d.dtitle like concat('%', #{value},'%') or d.dcontent like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by d.dno desc
